title: Men's voices: Digital Storytelling project (Vietnamese men)
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Vietnamese - Australia
abstract: From a land of conflict to a land of freedom - 11 digital stories
description: Eleven digital stories of family separation, war and conflict, escape and new beginnings, created by a group of Vietnamese men who participated in the Mens Line Workshop held in Sydney from 5-8 November 2007.
